plugin.name: Camel :: Maven Plugins :: Camel Maven Package
plugin.description: Maven plugin to help package Camel components and plugins

mojo.description: Used by Apache Camel project itself - do NOT use as end user.
Creates the Maven catalog for the Camel archetypes

parameter.name: outDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated archetypes

mojo.description: To be used by 3rd party Camel component developers to generate metadata.
Generate Endpoint DSL source files for Components.

parameter.name: baseDir
parameter.description: The base directory

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: componentsDslFactoriesPackageName
parameter.description: The package where to generate component DSL specific factories

parameter.name: componentsDslPackageName
parameter.description: The package where to the main DSL component package is

parameter.name: componentsMetadata
parameter.description: Component Metadata file

parameter.name: jsonDir
parameter.description: The catalog directory where the component json files are

parameter.name: outputResourcesDir
parameter.description: Components DSL Metadata

parameter.name: sourcesOutputDir
parameter.description: The output directory

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel plugins in a project and generates extra descriptor information for easier auto-discovery in Camel.

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: componentOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

mojo.description: Generate configurer classes from @Configurer annotated classes for main sources.

parameter.name: allowBuilderPattern
parameter.description: Whether to also allow using fluent builder style as configurer (getXXX and withXXX style).

parameter.name: classes
parameter.description: To generate configurer for these classes. The syntax is either fqn or fqn=targetFqn. This allows to map source class to target class to generate the source code using a different classname.

parameter.name: discoverClasses
parameter.description: Whether to discover configurer classes from classpath by scanning for @Configurer annotations. This requires using jandex-maven-plugin.

parameter.name: resourcesOutputDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated resource source code

parameter.name: skipDeprecated
parameter.description: Whether to skip deprecated methods.

parameter.name: sourcesOutputDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated java source code

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel plugins in a project and generates extra descriptor information for easier auto-discovery in Camel.

parameter.name: configurerResourceOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated dataformats file

parameter.name: configurerSourceOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated dataformats file

parameter.name: dataFormatOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated dataformats file

parameter.name: schemaOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated dataformats file

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel EIPs in a project and generates extra descriptor information for easier auto-discovery in Camel.

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The camel-core directory

parameter.name: outDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated models file

mojo.description: Generate Endpoint DSL source files for Components.

parameter.name: baseDir
parameter.description: The base directory

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: componentsFactoriesPackageName
parameter.description: The package where to generate component specific Endpoint factories

parameter.name: componentsMetadata
parameter.description: Component Metadata file

parameter.name: endpointFactoriesPackageName
parameter.description: The package where to generate component Endpoint factories

parameter.name: jsonDir
parameter.description: The catalog directory where the component json files are

parameter.name: outputResourcesDir
parameter.description: Components DSL Metadata

parameter.name: sourcesOutputDir
parameter.description: The output directory

mojo.description: Abstract class for endpoint uri factory generator.

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

mojo.description: Abstract class for @InvokeOnHeader factory generator.

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel plugins in a project and generates extra descriptor information for easier auto-discovery in Camel.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: The name of the index file. Default's to 'target/classes/META-INF/jandex.idx'

parameter.name: jaxbIndexOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel plugins in a project and generates extra descriptor information for easier auto-discovery in Camel.

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: languageOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated languages file

parameter.name: schemaOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated languages file

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel plugins in a project and generates legal files.

parameter.name: legalOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

mojo.description: Analyses the Camel plugins in a project and generates extra descriptor information for easier auto-discovery in Camel.
Used by Apache Camel project itself - do NOT use as end user.
Generate configurer classes from @Configurer annotated classes for test sources.

parameter.name: allowBuilderPattern
parameter.description: Whether to also allow using fluent builder style as configurer (getXXX and withXXX style).

parameter.name: classes
parameter.description: To generate configurer for these test classes. The syntax is either fqn or fqn=targetFqn. This allows to map source class to target class to generate the source code using a different classname.

parameter.name: discoverClasses
parameter.description: Whether to discover configurer classes from classpath by scanning for @Configurer annotations. This requires using jandex-maven-plugin.

parameter.name: resourcesOutputDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated test resource source code

parameter.name: skipDeprecated
parameter.description: Whether to skip deprecated methods.

parameter.name: sourcesOutputDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated test java source code

mojo.description: Generate Model lightweight XML Parser source code.
Generate Model lightweight XML Writer source code.
Generate Model lightweight YAML Writer source code.
Generate a Jandex index for classes compiled as part of the current project.

parameter.name: index
parameter.description: The name of the index file. Default's to 'target/classes/META-INF/jandex.idx'

mojo.description: Prepares the camel catalog to include component, data format, and eip descriptors, and generates a report.

parameter.name: componentsDir
parameter.description: The components directory where all the Apache Camel components are

parameter.name: componentsOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for components catalog

parameter.name: coreDir
parameter.description: The camel-core directory

parameter.name: dataFormatsOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for dataformats catalog

parameter.name: dslDir
parameter.description: The DSL directory

parameter.name: languagesDir
parameter.description: The camel-core-languages directory

parameter.name: languagesOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for languages catalog

parameter.name: mainDir
parameter.description: The directory where the camel-main metadata are

parameter.name: mainOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for main

parameter.name: modelDir
parameter.description: The camel-model directory

parameter.name: modelsOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for models catalog

parameter.name: othersOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for others catalog

parameter.name: schemasOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for XML schemas catalog

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip the execution of this mojo

parameter.name: springDir
parameter.description: The directory where the camel-spring XML models are

parameter.name: springSchemaDir
parameter.description: The directory where the camel-spring XML schema are

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether to validate if the components, data formats, and languages are properly documented and have all the needed details.

mojo.description: Prepares a Camel component analyzing if the maven module contains Camel * components * dataformats * languages * others And for each of those generates extra descriptors and schema files for easier auto-discovery in Camel and tooling.

parameter.name: baseDir
parameter.description: The base directory

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: componentOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

parameter.name: configurerResourceOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

parameter.name: configurerSourceOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

parameter.name: dataFormatOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated dataformats file

parameter.name: languageOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated languages file

parameter.name: otherOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated others file

parameter.name: schemaOutDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated schema file

mojo.description: Prepares the readme.md files content up to date with all the examples that Apache Camel ships.
Prepares camel-kamelet-main

parameter.name: catalogDir
parameter.description: The camel-catalog directory

mojo.description: Prepares camel-main by updating main documentation.

parameter.name: docDocDir
parameter.description: The documentation directory

parameter.name: mainJsonFile
parameter.description: The documentation directory

mojo.description: Prepares camel-main by generating Camel Main configuration metadata for tooling support.

parameter.name: outFolder
parameter.description: The output directory for generated spring boot tooling file

mojo.description: Unfortunately we do not have a release timestamp for every Camel release published to maven. So we need to grab the dates from camel-website git repository.

parameter.name: outDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated file

mojo.description: Updates camel-main with the known component, data-format, and language names.
Generate or updates the component/dataformat/language/eip documentation .adoc files in the project src/main/docs directory.

parameter.name: buildDir
parameter.description: The project build directory

parameter.name: componentDocDir
parameter.description: The component documentation directory

parameter.name: dataformatDocDir
parameter.description: The dataformat documentation directory

parameter.name: eipDocDir
parameter.description: The EIP documentation directory

parameter.name: failFast
parameter.description: Whether to fail the build fast if any Warnings was detected.

parameter.name: languageDocDir
parameter.description: The language documentation directory

parameter.name: languageDocDir2
parameter.description: The other language documentation directory

mojo.description: Updates the SensitiveHelper.java with the known secret option names
Validate a Camel component analyzing if the meta-data files for * components * dataformats * languages all contains the needed meta-data such as assigned labels, documentation for each option

parameter.name: outDir
parameter.description: The output directory for generated components file

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether to validate if the components, data formats, and languages are properly documented and have all the needed details.
